text_logic_form: The line segment $WP$ is a median of triangle $WHA$.
The length of the line segment $AP$ is $3y + 11$ units.
The length of the line segment $PH$ is $7y - 5$ units.
The measure of angle $HWP$ is $x + 12$ degrees.
The measure of angle $PAW$ is $3x - 2$ degrees.
The measure of angle $HWA$ is $4x - 16$ degrees.

diagram_logic_form: Point $Q$ lies on the line segment connecting $W$ and $A$.
Point $X$ lies on the line segment connecting $W$ and $P$.
